snippet: Free Art Friday is an art scavenger hunt open to all.
abstract: Free Art Friday is an art scavenger hunt open to all.
lead_paragraph: On Fridays this spring — and only on Fridays — a street artist who goes by the name CB23 began posting photos on Instagram with the hashtags #FAFNY and #FAFNYC.

headline.main: Free Art Is Everywhere, if You Can Find It
